name: Go For Broke
description:
leaps you from your Burrow with full commitment, unleashing a deadly hail of gunfire assaulting up to five targets in a cone multiple times for 48 + 48% Weapon Damage before returning to your Burrow again if you can avoid damage. 

Striking Exposed targets has a 100% Critical Strike modifier.

This power will return you to Stealth if you take no damage while executing.
